name: NugetVersionSynchronizer
description: Set a .nuspec version field from a file version.
author: Cdiscount Alm / Jean-Michel Michel

inputs.name: dropFolderPath
inputs.label: Working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where the .nuspec and the model version files are located

inputs.name: nuspecFileName
inputs.label: Nuspec file name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the .nuspec file name to set

inputs.name: modelVersionFileName
inputs.label: Model version file name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file's name to get version property field.

inputs.name: forceToVersion
inputs.label: Force version number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Force version to this value (no synchronization from model version file).
